message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40% and we both walk away with a good chunk of money.
Alice, I think we should switch roles, and I'll take 60% this time. After all, you had your chance.
Bob, let's not be greedy.  I'm coming down to 55%. This is a fair deal considering the money is losing value fast.
Alice, we are losing value with each round. Let's split it evenly and end this game.
